1:-module(vmwareperformance_SUITE).
    2:
    3:%% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.

    4:-compile(export_all).
    5:
    6:-include("ct.hrl").
    7:
    8:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

    9:%% Test server callback functions

   10:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   11:
   12:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   13:%% Function: suite() -> DefaultData

   14:%% DefaultData: [tuple()]  

   15:%% Description: Require variables and set default values for the suite

   16:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   17:suite() -> [{timetrap,{minutes,10}}].
   18:
   19:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   20:%% Function: init_per_suite(Config) -> Config

   21:%% Config: [tuple()]

   22:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.

   23:%% Description: Initiation before the whole suite

   24:%%

   25:%% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config

   26:%% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.

   27:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   28:init_per_suite(Config) ->
   29:    Config.
   30:
   31:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   32:%% Function: end_per_suite(Config) -> _

   33:%% Config: [tuple()]

   34:%%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.

   35:%% Description: Cleanup after the whole suite

   36:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   37:end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   38:    ok.
   39:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------

   40:%% Function: all() -> TestCases

   41:%% TestCases: [Case] 

   42:%% Case: atom()

   43:%%   Name of a test case.

   44:%% Description: Returns a list of all test cases in this test suite

   45:%%--------------------------------------------------------------------      

   46:all() -> 
   47:    [correct_counter, correct_value, 
   48:	error_counter_url, error_counter_user,
   49:	error_counter_passwd,
   50:	error_value_url, error_value_user,
   51:	error_value_passwd].
   52:
   53:%% Function: sequences() -> Sequences 

   54:%%Sequences = [{SeqName,Testcases}]

   55:%%SeqName = atom()

   56:%%Testcases = [atom()]

   57:%% Description: Returns a list of sequenced test cases in this test suite

   58:sequences() ->
   59:	[].
   60:	
   61:correct_counter(_Config) ->
   62:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
   63:	Params = [{url, "http://192.168.2.112/sdk"}, {timeout, 60}, {usr, "root"}, {pwd, "888888"}],
   64:	
   65:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   66:	
   67:	{comment, Ret}.
   68:	
   69:correct_value(_Config) ->
   70:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
   71:	P:set_property(timeout, 60),
   72:	P:set_property(usr, "root"),
   73:	P:set_property(pwd, "888888"),
   74:	P:set_property(url, "http://192.168.2.112/sdk"),
   75:	P:set_property(browse, [{"cpu.usage.maximum(rate)##300#0invpath:/ha-datacenter/host/localhost.localdomain/localhost.localdomain",
   76:  "HostSystem/localhost.localdomain/Historical[300 secs]/cpu/usage.maximum[]"}]),
   77:	
   78:	P:update(),
   79:	
   80:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
   81:	
   82:	{comment, Good}.
   83:
   84:error_counter_url(_Config) ->
   85:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
   86:	Params = [{url, "http://192.168.0.55/sdk"}, {timeout, 60}, {usr, "root"}, {pwd, "888888"}],
   87:	
   88:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   89:	
   90:	{comment, Ret}.
   91:	
   92:error_counter_user(_Config) ->
   93:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
   94:	Params = [{url, "http://192.168.2.112/sdk"}, {timeout, 60}, {usr, "roo"}, {pwd, "888888"}],
   95:	
   96:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
   97:	
   98:	{comment, Ret}.
   99:	
  100:error_counter_passwd(_Config) ->
  101:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
  102:	Params = [{url, "http://192.168.2.112/sdk"}, {timeout, 60}, {usr, "root"}, {pwd, "88888"}],
  103:	
  104:	Ret = P:getBrowseData(Params),
  105:	
  106:	{comment, Ret}.
  107:
  108:error_value_url(_Config) ->
  109:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
  110:	P:set_property(timeout, 60),
  111:	P:set_property(usr, "root"),
  112:	P:set_property(pwd, "888888"),
  113:	P:set_property(url, "http://192.168.0.55/sdk"),
  114:	P:set_property(browse, [{"cpu.usage.maximum(rate)##300#0invpath:/ha-datacenter/host/localhost.localdomain/localhost.localdomain",
  115:  "HostSystem/localhost.localdomain/Historical[300 secs]/cpu/usage.maximum[]"}]),
  116:	
  117:	P:update(),
  118:	
  119:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
  120:	
  121:	{comment, Good}.
  122:
  123:error_value_user(_Config) ->
  124:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
  125:	P:set_property(timeout, 60),
  126:	P:set_property(usr, "roo"),
  127:	P:set_property(pwd, "888888"),
  128:	P:set_property(url, "http://192.168.2.112/sdk"),
  129:	P:set_property(browse, [{"cpu.usage.maximum(rate)##300#0invpath:/ha-datacenter/host/localhost.localdomain/localhost.localdomain",
  130:  "HostSystem/localhost.localdomain/Historical[300 secs]/cpu/usage.maximum[]"}]),
  131:	
  132:	P:update(),
  133:	
  134:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),
  135:	
  136:	{comment, Good}.
  137:
  138:error_value_passwd(_Config) ->
  139:	P = vmwareperformance_monitor:new(),
  140:	P:set_property(timeout, 60),
  141:	P:set_property(usr, "root"),
  142:	P:set_property(pwd, "88888"),
  143:	P:set_property(url, "http://192.168.2.112/sdk"),
  144:	P:set_property(browse, [{"cpu.usage.maximum(rate)##300#0invpath:/ha-datacenter/host/localhost.localdomain/localhost.localdomain",
  145:  "HostSystem/localhost.localdomain/Historical[300 secs]/cpu/usage.maximum[]"}]),
  146:	
  147:	P:update(),
  148:	
  149:	{ok, {state_string, Good}} = P:get_attribute(state_string),

  151:	{comment, Good}.
